copilotCrossRef.target.description: Where to send prompts: 'web' opens copilot.microsoft.com; 'windows' copies prompt to clipboard and shows instructions for Windows Copilot; 'chatgpt' calls the OpenAI API and shows results in VS Code.

copilotCrossRef.openaiModel.description: OpenAI model to use when target is 'chatgpt'.

copilotCrossRef.openaiBaseUrl.description: Base URL for OpenAI API (only needed for proxies/enterprise gateways).

copilotCrossRef.onboardingPrompt.description: When enabled, prompts to set an OpenAI API key on startup if target is 'chatgpt' and no key is stored.

copilotCrossRef.debateMaxRounds.description: Maximum number of Critic→Builder rounds for Debate mode. The debate stops early when the Action Items checklist has no unchecked items.

copilotCrossRef.copilotUrl.description: Base URL for Microsoft Copilot web experience.

copilotCrossRef.openInSimpleBrowser.description: Open Copilot inside VS Code using the built-in Simple Browser (falls back to external browser if unavailable).

copilotCrossRef.prefillQueryInUrl.description: Attempt to prefill the Copilot prompt using a querystring parameter. This may stop working if the Copilot website changes.

copilotCrossRef.promptTemplate.default:
Please cross-check the following content and point out any issues, missing context, or better alternatives.

{{text}}
copilotCrossRef.promptTemplate.description: Template used when sending text to Copilot. Use {{text}} as a placeholder for the selection/prompt.

copilotCrossRef.copyPromptToClipboard.description: Copy the generated Copilot prompt to your clipboard (recommended, since prefill via URL is not guaranteed).

copilotCrossRef.broker.modelA.provider.description: Provider for Model A in the conversation broker.

copilotCrossRef.broker.modelA.model.description: Model name (or Azure deployment name) for Model A.

copilotCrossRef.broker.modelA.baseUrl.description: Base URL/endpoint for Model A (OpenAI: https://api.openai.com/v1; LM Studio: http://localhost:1234/v1; Ollama: http://localhost:11434/v1; Azure OpenAI: your endpoint URL).

copilotCrossRef.broker.modelA.systemProm.default: You are Speaker A. Be precise and critical when needed.

copilotCrossRef.broker.modelB.provider.description: Provider for Model B in the conversation broker.

copilotCrossRef.broker.modelB.model.description: Model name (or Azure deployment name) for Model B.

copilotCrossRef.broker.modelB.systemProm.default: You are Speaker B. Be constructive and propose improvements.

copilotCrossRef.broker.maxTurns.description: Maximum number of assistant turns (A or B responses) before stopping.

copilotCrossRef.broker.stopCondition.description: Stop condition used by the conversation broker. 'checklistEmpty' stops early when the last assistant message has no unchecked checklist items (e.g. '- [ ]').

copilotCrossRef.broker.azureApiVersion.description: Azure OpenAI API version (used when provider is azureOpenai).
